scripts._comment_local_network1: These are all you commands you need to run (in this order)
scripts._comment_local_network2: to start the game contracts on the your network. This has been simplified to:
scripts._comment_local_network3: `pnpm run contract:start:local` so you do not have to run all the commands manually
scripts._comment_local_network5: Commands will be executed using `.env.local` in contracts/common/
scripts._comment_local_network6: and will also use `.env.local` in client/apps/game for setting game config
scripts.indexer:start:local: pnpm run toml:update:local && cd ./contracts/game && ./ext/scripts/indexer.sh --network local --rpc http://127.0.0.1:8080
scripts.config:deploy:local: pnpm run build:packages && pnpm --dir ./client/config run local
scripts.contract:start:local: pnpm run katana:start:local && pnpm run game:migrate:local && pnpm run seasonpass:deploy:local && pnpm run seasonresources:deploy:local && pnpm run indexer:start:local && pnpm run config:deploy:local
scripts.contract:stop:local: pnpm run katana:stop:local && pnpm run indexer:stop:local
scripts._comment_slot_network1: These are all you commands you need to run (in this order)
scripts._comment_slot_network2: Commands will be executed using `.env.slot` in contracts/common/
scripts._comment_slot_network3: and will also use `.env.slot` in client/apps/game for setting game config
scripts.indexer:start:slot: pnpm run toml:update:slot && bash contracts/game/ext/scripts/slot.sh torii --network slot --world 0x0009dd5e66cfa83f893c2a70b9ea5221e2df18aaf52a111fe9003264f948c7aa --toml ./contracts/game
scripts.config:deploy:slot: pnpm run build:packages && pnpm --dir ./client/config run slot
scripts._comment_sepolia_network1: These are all you commands you need to run (in this order)
scripts._comment_sepolia_network2: Commands will be executed using `.env.sepolia` in contracts/common/
scripts._comment_sepolia_network3: and will also use `.env.sepolia` in client/apps/game for setting game config
scripts.indexer:start:sepolia: pnpm run toml:update:sepolia && bash contracts/game/ext/scripts/slot.sh torii --network sepolia --world 0x0009dd5e66cfa83f893c2a70b9ea5221e2df18aaf52a111fe9003264f948c7aa --toml ./contracts/game
scripts.config:deploy:sepolia: pnpm run build:packages && pnpm --dir ./client/config run sepolia
scripts._comment_mainnet_network1: These are all you commands you need to run (in this order)
scripts._comment_mainnet_network2: Commands will be executed using `.env.mainnet` in contracts/common/
scripts._comment_mainnet_network3: and will also use `.env.mainnet` in client/apps/game for setting game config
scripts.indexer:start:mainnet: pnpm run toml:update:mainnet && bash contracts/game/ext/scripts/slot.sh torii --network mainnet --world 0x0009dd5e66cfa83f893c2a70b9ea5221e2df18aaf52a111fe9003264f948c7aa --toml ./contracts/game
scripts.config:deploy:mainnet: pnpm run build:packages && pnpm --dir ./client/config run mainnet
scripts._comment_seasonresources_revoke1: Revoke the minter role of the in-game bridge system from all season resource contracts
scripts._comment_seasonresources_revoke2: Commands will be executed using `.env.{network}` in contracts/common/
